text: Anthony Curcillo Jr. (May 27, 1931 â€“ December 8, 2020) was an American football player. He was born in Long Branch, New Jersey. His playing career lasted from 1953 to 1958. Curcillo played for the Chicago Cardinals and the Hamilton Tiger-Cats. Curcillo died of COVID-19 on December 8, 2020 in Riverside, California at the age of 89.Tony Curcillo, Woody Hayes' First Starting Quarterback At Ohio State, Dies At 89 ==References== Category:1931 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in California Category:Arizona Cardinals players Category:Hamilton Tiger-Cats players Category:American football quarterbacks Category:Sportspeople from New Jersey
title: Tony Curcillo
